text: Ordinary Silence is an album by Ohio-based pop punk band Mixtapes. ==Background== The second full length released by Mixtapes, the album was released in just under a year after their debut full length Even on the Worst Nights. Originally intending on releasing an EP prior to the 2014 Warped Tour, the band found themselves with enough songs to make it a full-length album. ==Track listing== ==Personnel== *Ryan Rockwell - vocals, guitar, bass guitar *Maura Weaver - vocals, guitar *Boone Haley - drums ==References== Category:2013 albums Category:No Sleep Records albums
title: Ordinary Silence
